title: Why Carl Benjamin Won't Go to Church
description:
Jonathan Pageau had a conversation with Carl Benjamin also known as Sargon of Akkad. It was an interesting pairing given the fact that Pageau isn't primarily a political commentator. Benjamin really opened up about his thoughts on religion and church. It was quite fascinating. It is on thinkspot. https://www.thinkspot.com/online_content/jonathan-pageau/jonathan-pageau-and-carl-benjamin/AbuNQ2/Event?live=yes&t=watch 

Pageau and Vervaeke on Rebel Wisdom https://youtu.be/dUG_fIfG0lo

Now Pageau and Benjamin on Pageau's channel https://youtu.be/ZV9UnChaLmk

Belief in God is not the Key Difference between Atheists and Christians https://youtu.be/GHWERNFXN_c

Pageau and Tom Holland https://youtu.be/-qGfkFlZKgA 

A Secular Age https://amzn.to/3eOtugg 

CS Lewis Miracles https://amzn.to/35jhvnS 

 Ryan Bennett Seeing the Utility of Religion https://youtu.be/1PCDLwHUIfU
